title: Who Rigged the Census?
sub_head: Under-counts may have cost Florida and Texas another House seat.
body:
Well, well. Remember how Democrats accused the Trump Administration of trying to rig the 2020 Census? Now a Census Bureau study reveals that Republican-leaning states may have been hurt by mistaken under-counts.
On Thursday the bureau published the results of its post-enumeration analysis, which it does after every Census to identify errors in the count. Its study found that 14 states were over- or under-counted by statistically significant margins. Compare that to 2010 when the bureauâ€™s post-hoc analysis found that all the state population counts were more or less accurate.
